actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6+1) bludgeoning damage and the target is grappled (escape DC 11). The crab has two claws and can grapple one creature with each.

special_abilities.name: Amphibious
special_abilities.desc: The crab can breathe air and water.
